anya-e0905n1:2: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:5: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante seyyasakaṁ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:7: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:8: Pucchā – atthi āvuso tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppannapaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:9: Vissajjanā – ekā bhante paññatti, ekā anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti tasmiṁ natthi.
anya-e0905n1:11: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi saṅghādisesoti ayaṁ bhante tattha mūlapaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:13: Vissajjanā – aññatra supinantāti ayaṁ bhante tattha anupaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:15: Vissajjanā – sañcetanikā sukkavissaṭṭhi aññatrasupinantā saṅghādisoti ayaṁ bhante tattha paripuṇṇapaññatti.
anya-e0905n1:16: Pucchā – sādhāraṇa paññattinukho āvuso asādhāraṇa paññattinukho.
anya-e0905n1:18: Pucchā – tattha āvuso upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocento kati āpattiyo āpajjati.
anya-e0905n1:19: Vissajjanā – upakkamitvā bhante asuciṁ mocento tisso āpattiyo āpajjati, ceteti upakkamati muccati āpatti
anya-e0905n1:20: Saṅghādisesassa , ceteti upakkamati na muccati āpatti thullaccayassa, payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
anya-e0905n1:22: Vissajjanā – channaṁ bhante anāpatti supinantena mocentassa na mocanādhippāyassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassa imesaṁ kho bhante channaṁ anāpatti.
anya-e0905n1:23: Pucchā – pañcannaṁ āvuso pātimokkhuddesānaṁ katamena uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n1:24: Vissajjanā – pañcannaṁ bhante pātimokkhuddesānaṁ tatiyena uddesena uddesaṁ āgacchati.
anya-e0905n1:25: Pucchā – catunnaṁ āvuso vipattīnaṁ katamā vipatti.
anya-e0905n1:32: Vissajjanā – na eva rūpaṁ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu ayaṁ bhante paṭipatti.
anya-e0905n1:33: Pucchā – kati āvuso atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:34: Vissajjanā – dasa bhante atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocentassa saṅghādiseso paññatto saṅghasuṭṭhutāya…pe… vinayānuggahāya.
anya-e0905n1:38: Vissajjanā – yesaṁ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0905n1:40: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n1:43: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso tattha sanidāne sapadabhājanīye savinītavatthuke upanetabbaṁ vā apanetabbaṁ vā akkharapadapaccābhaṭṭhaṁ vā viraddhapadabyañjanaṁ vā.
anya-e0905n1:45_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ
anya-e0905n1:45_1: paṭhamassa saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadassa nidānampi pucchiṁ, puggalampi pucchiṁ, vatthumpi
anya-e0905n1:45_2: pucchiṁ, paññattimpi pucchiṁ, anupaññattimpi pucchi, āpattimpi pucchiṁ, anāpattimpi
anya-e0905n1:45_3: pucchiṁ, aññānipi evarūpāni anekāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni pucchiṁ, puṭṭho puṭṭho ca
anya-e0905n1:45_4: so āyasmā vicittasārābhivaṁso vissajjesi, itihidaṁ bhante paṭhama saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n1:45_5: saparivāraṁ nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n1:45_6: Tasmā yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0905n1:45_7: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ
anya-e0905n1:45_8: dhammavinayaṁ saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgītimahādhammasabhā
anya-e0905n1:45_9: pariyāpannā idaṁ paṭhamaṁ saṅghādisesa sikkhāpadaṁ nidānato paṭṭhāya ekaccānaṁ vacasā
anya-e0905n1:45_10: sajjhāyavasena ekaccānaṁ manasā manasikaraṇavasenaca ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
anya-e0905n1:46_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena mātukāmena saddhiṁ kāyasaṁsaggaṁ
anya-e0905n1:46_1: samāpajjantassa ca, mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsantassa ca, mātugāmassa santike
anya-e0905n1:46_2: attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ bhāsantassa ca, sañcarittaṁ samāpajjantassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:49: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante udāyittheraṁ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:51_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante udāyitthero mātugāmena saddhiṁ kāyasaṁsaggaṁ samāpajji,
anya-e0905n1:51_1: āyasmāyeva bhante udāyitthero mātugāmaṁ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi, āyasmāyeva bhante
anya-e0905n1:51_2: udāyitthero mātugāmassa santike attakāma pāricariyāya vaṇṇaṁ abhāsi, āyasmāyeva bhante
anya-e0905n1:51_3: udāyitthero sañcarittaṁ samāpajjiṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:53: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena saññācikāya kuṭiṁ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:56: Vissajjanā – āḷavike bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:58: Vissajjanā – āḷavikā bhante bhikkhū saññācikāyo kuṭiyo kārāpesuṁ, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:60: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena mahallakaṁ vihāraṁ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:63: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante channattheraṁ ārabbha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:65_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmā bhante channo vihāravatthuṁ sodhento aññataraṁ cetiyarukkhaṁ
anya-e0905n1:65_1: chedāpesi gāmapūjitaṁ nigamapūjitaṁ nagara pūjitaṁ janapadapūjitaṁ raṭṭhapūjitaṁ,
anya-e0905n1:67_0: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhikkhuṁ amūlakena pārājikena
anya-e0905n1:67_1: dhammena anuddhaṁsentassa ca, bhikkhuṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṁ lesamattaṁ
anya-e0905n1:67_2: upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsentassa ca saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:69: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:70_0: Vissajjanā – mettiyabhūmajakā bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto, mettiyabhūmajakā bhante
anya-e0905n1:70_1: bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ,
anya-e0905n1:70_2: teyeva bhante mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa
anya-e0905n1:70_3: adhikaraṇassa kiñcidesaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsesuṁ, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n1:72: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:74: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññattho.
anya-e0905n1:76: Devadatto bhante samaggassa saṅghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:78: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bhedānuvattakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantānaṁ saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:80: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:81_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto, sambahulā bhante bhikkhū
anya-e0905n1:81_1: devadattassa saṅghābhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṁ vaggavādakā, tasmiṁ
anya-e0905n1:83: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:85: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:86: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante channaṁ ārabbha paññatto, āyasmā bhante channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṁ vuccamāno attānaṁ avacanīyaṁ akāsi, tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:88: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya appaṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:90: Pucchā – kaṁ ārabbha āvuso kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:91_0: Vissajjanā – assaji punabbasuke bhante bhikkhū ārabbha paññatto, assajipunabbasukā
anya-e0905n1:91_1: bhante bhikkhū saṅghena pabbājanīyakammakatā chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā
anya-e0905n1:93: Pucchā – yaṁ tena āvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo ca aniyato dutiyo ca aniyato kattha paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:95: Pucchā – kaṁ āvuso ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ paññatto.
anya-e0905n1:96_0: Vissajjanā – āyasmantaṁ bhante udāyiṁ ārabbha paññatto, āyasmā bhante udāyī mātugāmena
anya-e0905n1:96_1: saddhiṁ ekoekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṁkammaniye nisajjaṁ kappesi, tasmiñca
anya-e0905n1:96_2: vatthusmiṁ, āyasmāyeva bhante udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṁ raho nisajjaṁ akāsi, tasmiñca
anya-e0905n1:98: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0905n1:101: Pucchā – atthi nukho āvuso ettha kocipi viraddhadoso.
anya-e0905n1:104_0: Suṇātu me bhante saṅgho, ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vicittasārābhivaṁsaṁ tipiṭakadhara
anya-e0905n1:104_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṁ paṭhama duṭṭhadosa sikkhāpadato paṭṭhāya pucchitabbāni anekāni
anya-e0905n1:104_2: ṭhānāni pucchiṁ, so ca āyasmā puṭṭho puṭṭho vissajjeti, itihidaṁ bhante sabbaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ
anya-e0905n1:104_3: nimmalaṁ suparisuddhaṁ tasseva bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa, tasmā
anya-e0905n1:104_4: yathāpure mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā porāṇasaṁgītikārā brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitiyā
anya-e0905n1:104_5: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ
anya-e0905n1:104_6: saṁgāyiṁsuceva anusaṁgāyiṁsuca, evameva mayampi dāni sabbeva chaṭṭhasaṁgīti mahādhammasabhāpariyāpannā
anya-e0905n1:104_7: imāni sikkhāpadāni ekato gaṇasajjhāyaṁ katvā saṁgāyeyyāma.
